inputDataShape.name: Request
inputDataShape.specification:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<d:SchemaSet xmlns:d="http://atlasmap.io/xml/schemaset/v2" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"><xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://syndesis.io/v1/swagger-connector-template/request" elementFormDefault="qualified"><xsd:element name="request"><xsd:complexType><xsd:sequence><xsd:element xmlns:p="http://syndesis.io/v1/swagger-connector-template/parameters" ref="p:parameters"></xsd:element><xsd:element name="body"><xsd:complexType><xsd:sequence><xsd:element xmlns:b="http://example.com/Complex" ref="b:complex"></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType></xsd:element></xsd:schema><d:AdditionalSchemas><xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://syndesis.io/v1/swagger-connector-template/parameters"><xsd:element name="parameters"><xsd:complexType><xsd:sequence><xsd:element name="pathParam" type="xsd:string"/><xsd:element name="queryParam" type="xsd:integer"/></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType></xsd:element></xsd:schema><xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://example.com/Complex"><xsd:element name="complex"><xsd:complexType><xsd:sequence><xsd:element name="date" type="xsd:string"/><xsd:element name="status" type="xsd:string"/><xsd:element name="children"><xsd:complexType><xsd:sequence><xsd:element xmlns:p0="http://example.com/Child" ref="p0:child" maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0"></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType></xsd:element><xsd:element name="complete" type="xsd:boolean"/></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute name="id" type="xsd:integer"/></xsd:complexType></xsd:element></xsd:schema><xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://example.com/Child"><xsd:element name="child"><xsd:complexType><xsd:sequence><xsd:element name="description" type="xsd:string"/></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute name="name" type="xsd:string"/></xsd:complexType></xsd:element></xsd:schema></d:AdditionalSchemas></d:SchemaSet>

authenticationType.description: Type of authentication used to connect to the API
authenticationType.label: producer

basePath.description: API basePath for example /v2. Default is unset if set overrides the value present in OpenAPI document.
basePath.label: producer

host.description: Scheme hostname and port to direct the HTTP requests to in the form of https://hostname:port.
host.label: producer
